caption: The dessert is so good
A cute cafe with a really strange/mean waitress? 3 stars for good cheese bread and atmosphere.

The best brunch place in downtown Miami. Large menu and everything is delicious and big portions.  Their pastries and carrot chocolate lava cake is incredible. Very Instagram-worthy dishes. Wish it was open earlier and later!

Friendly and attentive staff and delicious food, made this a very lovely family outing! The Feijoada was really good and the carrot cake amazing! Highly recommended cafe!!
Amazing food and super friendly service, best food in town.

muy yum! worship the sun y'all & start yer dayo wit' a Brazilian breakfast aqui, stash a few or three brigadeiros—a traditional chocolate treat—to snack on later. you will not be sorry... unless ya don't follow mi sage advise here. geaux gitcha' some comrades!

From the first moment  you step in this restaurant  the personel give you an agreeable feeling. Very friendly stuff, it is a friendly place to go out with buddies or with your date. delicious  cuisine, qualified  chef de cuisine, modest  pay and courteous  service. Highly recommended.

Extraordinary cafe & restaurant with a sublime brazilian touch. Chocolate, sandwiches, and passion fruit dessert just out of this world. Ozzie offered us a tour showing us the different dessert they offer to go. He is really in charge of customer delightment. Great experience.
